process_file() {
    local file="$1"
    local output_dir="$2"
    
    if [[ ! -f "$file" ]]; then
        echo "File not found: $file"
        return 1
    fi
    
    local basename=$(basename "$file")
    cp "$file" "$output_dir/$basename.bak"
    return 0
}

process_file "/tmp/data.txt" "/backup"
